  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER FOUND ON TOPSLIDE OF BOXLINE 2 CALLED IN LEAKER, DAMAGE INSPECTION, LEAKER. WHEN OPENING BOX FOUND UNDECLARED HAZMAT, SULFURIC ACID SOLUTION. ALSO DISCOVERED FLAMMABLE LIQUIDS, N.O.S. PGIII UN1993 AND SULFURIC ACID PG II UN2796.
